title: Create Japan account Send
description: This call opens a new real-money account with the 'Japan' Landing Company. This call can be made from Japan virtual-money account or real-money account. In latter case client information fields in this call will be ignored, and existing data will be used

first_name.description: Within 1-30 characters, use only word characters, spaces, hyphens, full-stops or apostrophes.

last_name.description: Within 1-30 characters, use only words characters, spaces, hyphens, full-stops or apostrophes.

address_state.description: Possible value receive from states_list call.

address_postcode.description: Follows the exact pattern of three numbers, a dash, and four numbers.

phone.description: Within 6-35 digits, allowing '+' in front, numbers or space.

secret_question.description: Accept any value in enum list. Required for new account and existing client details will be used if client open another account.

secret_answer.description: Answer to secret question, within 1-100 characters. All characters are allowed except <,>,&,),(. Required for new account and existing client details will be used if client open another account

tax_residence.description: Residence for tax purpose. Comma separated iso country code if multiple jurisdictions. Only applicable for real money account. Required for maltainvest landing company.

tax_identification_number.description: Tax identification number. Only applicable for real money account. Required for maltainvest landing company.

annual_income.description: Annual income. Accept any value in enum list.

financial_asset.description: Financial asset. Accept any value in enum list.

daily_loss_limit.description: Daily limit on losses, in JPY

trading_experience_equities.description: Equities trading experience. Accept any value in enum list.

trading_experience_commodities.description: Commodities trading experience. Accept any value in enum list.

trading_experience_foreign_currency_depo.description: Foreign currency deposit trading experience. Accept any value in enum list.

trading_experience_margin_fx.description: Margin FX trading experience. Accept any value in enum list.

trading_experience_investment_trust.description: Investment trust trading experience. Accept any value in enum list.

trading_experience_public_bond.description: Public and corporation bond trading experience. Accept any value in enum list.

trading_experience_option_trading.description: OTC Derivative (Option) trading experience. Accept any value in enum list.

trading_purpose.description: Trading purpose. Accept any value in enum list.

hedge_asset.description: Classification of assets requiring hedge. This field is only required if 'Hedging' is selected for 'trading_purpose'.

hedge_asset_amount.description: Hedge asset amount in JPY. This field is only required if 'Hedging' is selected for 'trading_purpose'.

agree_use_electronic_doc.description: Client must agree on the T&C

agree_warnings_and_policies.description: Client must agree on the T&C

confirm_understand_own_judgment.description: Client must agree on the T&C

confirm_understand_trading_mechanism.description: Client must agree on the T&C
